title: 关于提高OEC借贷USDT利息的提案
body:
由于目前USDT已经没有流动性,没有人存款也没有人还钱,为了使USDT能保持健康的流动性和平台的长远发展,必须迫使借贷USDT的人还钱,所以有必要把借贷利息调整至一百以上

At present, usdt has no liquidity, no one deposits and no one pays back. In order for usdt to maintain healthy liquidity and long-term development of the platform, people who borrow usdt must be forced to pay back. Therefore, it is necessary to adjust the loan interest to more than 100
author: 0x0a7C7203De700469F41e037Fd5C3a3BDA352715F
